nodes.text: Grand Moff, droïd assassin & vieux cristaux

Grand Moff, droïd assassin et vieux cristaux was a roleplaying adventure in the French gaming magazine Casus Belli. It was written by Laurent Guinoiseau and illustrated by Eric Puech and Cyrille Daujean.
C-3PO was named Z6PO in the scenario, as it was his name in the french dubbing of Episode IV.
